comments.content:
The link says fill out the form and ABC News may contact you. Would they contact you via...courier? :)

Sorry couldn't help myself.

It was never uncommon (in the course of human history) for pregnant women to eat dirt as a source of minerals.

Now that we are completely controlled by the drug companies and their lackeys, physicians, it is not amazing whatsoever that they would apply a syndrome to this.

[One thing](http://web.archive.org/web/20130529043907/http:/www.rspb.org.uk/gardens/guide/atoz/m/magpie.asp) leads to [another](http://web.archive.org/web/20130529043907/http:/www.bbc.co.uk/tyne/sport/clubs/newcastle_united/champions_league/magpie_magic3.shtml)

Yes I suffer but I can't stop myself returning season after season :)  
Tim
